plot: Moritaka Mashiro and Akito Takagi have come a long way since they started making manga in middle school, but trials still await them as they head towards their goal of getting an anime adaptation for one of their manga. As they continue to grow as artists and as people, they will be faced with new friends, new rivals, and new hurdles to overcome.
opening_theme: "23:40" by Hyadain feat. Base Ball Bear
ending_theme: "♪Pride on Everyday（プライド・オン・エブリデイ)" by Sphere
